name: K'Sante
subtitle: the Pride of Nazumah
description: Defiant and courageous, K'Sante battles colossal beasts and ruthless Ascended to protect his home of Nazumah, a coveted oasis amid the sands of Shurima. But after a falling-out with his former partner, K'Sante realizes that in order to become a warrior worthy of leading his city, he must temper his single-minded drive for success. Only then can he avoid falling prey to his own pride and find the wisdom he needs to defeat the vicious monsters threatening his people.

abilities.name: Dauntless Instinct
abilities.description: K'Sante's Abilities mark targets to take more damage on his next Attack.

abilities.name: Ntofo Strikes
abilities.description:
Strike a weapon forward, damaging and slowing all enemies in a short line.

On hit, grants a stack for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, this skill fires a shockwave that pulls enemies in.

abilities.name: Path Maker
abilities.description: K'Sante charges up before dashing. K'Sante is unstoppable and takes less damage while charging. Any targets hit by the dash are knocked to the end of the dash and stunned.

abilities.name: Footwork
abilities.description: K'Sante will dash to an ally and both will gain a shield. If there is no ally, K'Sante will still dash to the location at a reduced range and gain a shield.
